thread.title: yakov hayun
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 yakov hayun

author: yakov hayun
title: yakov hayun
text:
i order items (4 orders) from banggood and after 2 month that items not arrive they refund me completely and last week i finally get one of order
because mistake of isreal post office its sloooow of course i pay again
all the process with sabrina from customer service was great
i recommend to buy from banggood they trustworthy
